title: Common Denominator
text: The fractions have a common denominator, so add the numerators and place the sum over the common denominator
speech: The fractions have a common denominator, so add the numerators and place the sum over the common denominator

title: Factor
text: Factor the numerator and denominator to show the common factors. Remove the common factors and simplify if possible.
speech: Factor the numerator and denominator to show the common factors. Remove the common factors and simplify if possible.
